sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Vijay is an Oracle-certified trailblazer with over 16 years of experience in Oracle ERP and Cloud technologies. As an Oracle University instructor and certified trainer, he brings deep technical knowledge across Fusion Technical + OIC. He has completed 35+ batches, trained over 16,000 learners, and is known for his versatile training methods—be it corporate, online, or classroom. Vijay is also an active Oracle community contributor, offering mentorship and staying at the forefront of tech advancements. Choose Vijay as your mentor and elevate your skills with practical insights, expert guidance, and a path to real-world success in Oracle Fusion Technical & Integration.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion Technical + OIC Training?
faqs.answer: Our course covers key technical areas including BI Publisher, OTBI, Data Models, Technical Architecture, HDL (HCM Data Loader), FBDI, ADF, Web Services, SOAP/REST Integrations, Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), and real-time use cases. For a detailed module list, please refer to our course syllabus.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Training sessions are conducted Monday to Saturday, with each class lasting 1 hour per day to provide a consistent and focused learning experience.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, weekend batches are not available. Live sessions are held Monday to Saturday for a steady learning progression.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer self-paced study. However, live doubt clarification sessions are not included in the self-paced option.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are available based on your performance in mock evaluations, allowing you to gain hands-on experience in Oracle Fusion Technical and OIC projects.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle Fusion Technical + OIC course is offered as a comprehensive program, and individual modules cannot be taken separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist with building a professional resume tailored to Oracle Fusion Technical and OIC job roles, with guidance from our expert mentors.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a laptop or desktop is essential to access the cloud instance and complete technical configurations, integrations, and hands-on labs effectively.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites or Minimum Qualifications?
faqs.answer: Yes, basic knowledge of SQL is mandatory for this course. The program is designed for graduates from any academic background (Degree, PG, B.Tech, etc.), and no prior experience with Oracle is required, as the course begins with the fundamentals of Oracle Fusion Technical and OIC.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes, we start from the fundamentals and gradually move into advanced technical topics. This course suits both beginners and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support your job placement process through resume building, mock interviews, and career guidance. We also partner with companies such as Hitachi Vantara, Evosys, Tech Mahindra, LTI, and more.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Support for Oracle Certification?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through the certification process and provide sample questions and preparation tips for Oracle Fusion Technical and OIC certifications.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer daily recorded sessions and module-wise study materials, including implementation screenshots, navigation steps, and practical documentation.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we share frequently asked interview questions for each module and conduct mock interviews to prepare you for job opportunities.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance or Application Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, you get 6 months of Oracle Cloud instance access for practical learning. No software installation is required—just access through a browser.

faqs.question: Can I Retake This Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, once you register, you receive 1-year access to attend multiple live batches of the Oracle Fusion Technical + OIC training.

faqs.question: Can I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive an official Course Completion Certificate after successfully finishing the training.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: Basic understanding of SQL, XML, and web services is helpful, but not mandatory. We teach from scratch and make it beginner-friendly.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, personalized one-on-one training is available on request. Please note that one-on-one sessions are priced higher than group sessions.
